-- auto-generated definition
create table run
(
  id        int auto_increment
    primary key,
  date      date          null,
  miles     double        null,
  location  varchar(32)   null,
  elevation double        null,
  hours     int default 0 null,
  minute    int default 0 null,
  seconds   int default 0 null,
  pace      double        null,
  effort    int           null,
  maxHR     int           null,
  maxSpeed  double        null
);


CREATE TABLE `location` (
  `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT,
   `name` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
   `town` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
   `state` varchar(255) DEFAULT NULL,
    PRIMARY KEY (`id`));

ALTER TABLE run ADD COLUMN pace double;
ALTER TABLE run ADD COLUMN effort int;
